biotools.summary: Proteogenomic pipeline integrating ribosome profiling (RIBO-seq) data in the search for new proteoforms in proteomic validation data. The pipeline does a genome-wide construction of candidate translation products based on ribosome occupancy.

bioschemas.name: PROTEOFORMER
bioschemas.summary: Proteogenomic pipeline integrating ribosome profiling (RIBO-seq) data in the search for new proteoforms in proteomic validation data. The pipeline does a genome-wide construction of candidate translation products based on ribosome occupancy.
